1080650.name: Moo Lander Demo
1080650.description:
Milk - the energy source so pure that it’s rivaled by the brightest hypernovas, has been lost to your people after a long and brutal conflict.
Your mission is to recover ancient device capable of producing infinite amounts of it, from Solar System.
Can you get to the device in time? The fate of the Landers is in your hands!

Moo Lander is a 2D adventure platformer, where you take control over your people’s last remaining flying saucer to scour varied environments in search for the source of infinite amounts of precious milk. Discover hidden secrets, solve puzzles, fight your enemies and tame the Mighty Cows!



  • Tame the Mighty Cows
    Each one of those powerful bosses will pose a considerable threat and is a challenge worth remembering!
  • Upgrade your ship
    Use a set of over X unique abilities and meaningful upgrades branching into two separate trees!
  • Fight a variety of enemies
    Over 20 kinds of enemies are waiting for you to prevent you from fulfilling your goal. Each of them requires a different approach to deal with!
  • Interactive environment
    Explore and interact with objects around you using your abilities in an unusual way!
  • Engaging single-player campaign
    Play through over 5-hour long emotional campaign full of memorable characters!
  • Online multiplayer
    Help your fellow Landers in cooperative mode or take control of the Might Cow and fight against the alien threat!
  • 4 player co-op
    Experience the game with your friends in 4 player couch co-op![
  • 5 unique terrains
    Discover beautiful, yet lethal landscapes of alien Earth and Mars.
  • Challenge yourself
    Save your kind on one of 3 difficulty levels (with a little extra for all of you hardcore Milk Drinkers)
1080650.supported_languages:
英语*, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
*具有完全音频支持的语言
